DeathSteel::

He felt the handle hit his lower jaw. He takes a step back, but 
doesn't loose his concentration. He swings upward and to the side to 
bring the blade around into Kaiser's side.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        Recognizing the feint he turns slightly to the side and 
crosses his 
> blades in front of the oncoming slash in a block that jarred his 
arms and set 
> his rear foot back a few inches.  Quickly pulling one blade out of 
the block 
> he lashes out, aiming the pommel of his blade at DeathSteel's face.
